apiChineseName: 淘宝客-推广者-维权退款订单查询

applyScopes.name: 淘宝客【推广者】推广订单及数据查询

description: 淘宝客维权退款订单查询-渠道管理和会员运营管理专用

labels.tips: 不需要用户授权，就能获取到数据

name: taobao.tbk.relation.refund

publicParams.description: 用户登录授权成功后，TOP颁发给应用的授权信息，详细介绍请点击这里。当此API的标签上注明：“需要授权”，则此参数必传；“不需要授权”，则此参数不需要传；“可选授权”，则此参数为可选
publicParams.name: session

publicParams.description: 时间戳，格式为yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss，时区为GMT+8，例如：2015-01-01 12:00:00。淘宝API服务端允许客户端请求最大时间误差为10分钟
publicParams.name: timestamp

publicParams.description: 签名的摘要算法，可选值为：hmac，md5，hmac-sha256。
publicParams.name: sign_method

publicParams.description: API输入参数签名结果，签名算法介绍请点击这里
publicParams.name: sign

publicParams.description: 响应格式。默认为xml格式，可选值：xml，json。
publicParams.name: format

publicParams.description: 是否采用精简JSON返回格式，仅当format=json时有效，默认值为：false
publicParams.name: simplify

publicResponseParams.description: 平台颁发的每次请求访问的唯一标识
publicResponseParams.name: request_id

publicResponseParams.description: 请求访问失败时返回的根节点
publicResponseParams.name: error_response

publicResponseParams.description: 请求失败返回的错误码
publicResponseParams.name: code

publicResponseParams.description: 请求失败返回的错误信息
publicResponseParams.name: msg

publicResponseParams.description: 请求失败返回的子错误码
publicResponseParams.name: sub_code

publicResponseParams.description: 请求失败返回的子错误信息
publicResponseParams.name: sub_msg

publicResponseParams.description: 请求成功返回的根节点，'***' 为API名称的下划线模式
publicResponseParams.name: ***_response

subParams.description: 1-维权发起时间，2-订单结算时间（正向订单），3-维权完成时间，4-订单创建时间，5-订单更新时间
subParams.name: search_type

subParams.description: 1 表示2方，2表示3方，0表示不限
subParams.name: refund_type

subParams.description: 1代表渠道关系id，2代表会员关系id
subParams.name: biz_type

subParams.description: 第三方应该返还的补贴
subParams.name: tk_subsidy_fee_refund3rd_pub

subParams.description: 第三方应该返还的佣金
subParams.name: tk_commission_fee_refund3rd_pub

subParams.description: 第二方应该返还的补贴(不包括技术服务费)
subParams.name: tk_subsidy_fee_refund_pub

subParams.description: 第二方应该返还的佣金(不包括技术服务费)
subParams.name: tk_commission_fee_refund_pub

subParams.description: 维权创建(淘客结算回执) 4,维权成功(淘客结算回执) 2,维权失败(淘客结算回执) 3,发生多次维权，待处理      11,从淘客处补扣（钱已结给淘客） 等待扣款 12,从淘客处补扣（钱已结给淘客） 扣款成功 13,从卖家处补扣（钱已结给卖家） 等待扣款 14,从卖家处补扣（钱已结给卖家） 扣款成功 15
subParams.name: refund_status

subParams.description: 接口返回值信息，跟rpc架构保持一致
subParams.name: result_code

sdkDemos.name: JAVA
PHP
.NET

sdkDemos.descprition:
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
import top.api

req=top.api.TbkRelationRefundRequest(url,port)
req.set_app_info(top.appinfo(appkey,secret))

req.search_option=""
try:
	resp= req.getResponse()
	print(resp)
except Exception,e:
	print(e)
sdkDemos.name: Python
NodeJS
C/C++

sdkDemos.descprition:
from datetime import datetime
from topsdk.client import TopApiClient,TopException
from topsdk.ability414.ability414 import Ability414
from topsdk.ability414.request.taobao_tbk_relation_refund_request import *

if __name__ == '__main__':
    # create Client
    client = TopApiClient(appkey='<your-appkey>', app_sercet='<your-appsecret>', top_gateway_url='<top-gateway-url>',verify_ssl=False)
    ability = Ability414(client=client)

    # create domain
    taobaoTbkRelationRefundTopApiRefundRptOption = TaobaoTbkRelationRefundTopApiRefundRptOption()
    taobaoTbkRelationRefundTopApiRefundRptOption.page_size = 1
    taobaoTbkRelationRefundTopApiRefundRptOption.search_type = 1
    taobaoTbkRelationRefundTopApiRefundRptOption.refund_type = 1
    taobaoTbkRelationRefundTopApiRefundRptOption.start_time = datetime.now()
    taobaoTbkRelationRefundTopApiRefundRptOption.page_no = 1
    taobaoTbkRelationRefundTopApiRefundRptOption.biz_type = 1

    # create request
    request = TaobaoTbkRelationRefundRequest()
    request.search_option = taobaoTbkRelationRefundTopApiRefundRptOption
    try:
        response = ability.taobao_tbk_relation_refund(request)
        print(response)
    except TopException as e:
        print(e)
sdkDemos.name: Python3
GO

sdkDemos.descprition:
<?php
require "../vendor/autoload.php";
use Topsdk\Topapi\TopApiClient;
use Topsdk\Topapi\Ability414\Request\TaobaoTbkRelationRefundRequest;
use Topsdk\Topapi\Ability414\Ability414;
use Topsdk\Topapi\Ability414\Domain\TaobaoTbkRelationRefundTopApiRefundRptOption;


// create Client
$client = new TopApiClient("<your-appkey>","<your-appsecret>","<top-gateway-url>");
$ability = new Ability414($client);

// create domain
$taobaoTbkRelationRefundTopApiRefundRptOption = new TaobaoTbkRelationRefundTopApiRefundRptOption();
$taobaoTbkRelationRefundTopApiRefundRptOption->setPageSize(1);
$taobaoTbkRelationRefundTopApiRefundRptOption->setSearchType(1);
$taobaoTbkRelationRefundTopApiRefundRptOption->setRefundType(1);
/*
    2018-10-10 00:00:00
*/
$taobaoTbkRelationRefundTopApiRefundRptOption->setStartTime(date("Y-m-d H:i:s"));
$taobaoTbkRelationRefundTopApiRefundRptOption->setPageNo(1);
$taobaoTbkRelationRefundTopApiRefundRptOption->setBizType(1);

// create request
$request = new TaobaoTbkRelationRefundRequest();
$request->setSearchOption(taobaoTbkRelationRefundTopApiRefundRptOption);

$response = $ability->taobaoTbkRelationRefund($request);
var_dump($response);
